__e: And it doesn't make any sense to try to figure out why these things happen.
I loved her, and she was everything you could never be but insist on trying to be.
I've been trying to tell this story for a long time, and I feel as if I've failed to get the message across.
She waited longer than most women would wait. She thought you were dead.
But what you did was futile and wrong.
It is yours to decide, my girl, what is in vain and what is not.
